t = int(raw_input().strip())

for _ in xrange(t):
    n = int(raw_input().strip())
    a = map(int, raw_input().strip().split())
    counts = {}
    c = v = 0

    for ai in a:
        if ai in counts:
            counts[ai] += 1
        else:
            counts[ai] = 1
        if counts[ai] > c:
            c = counts[ai]
            v = ai
        elif counts[ai] == c and ai < v:
            v = ai

    print v, c
